                  int def)
        Constructor for SwordEnemy
        Parameters:
        x - The x location for the sprite to be placed
        y - The y location for the sprite to be placed
        width - How wide in pixels the image should be
        height - How high in pixels the image should be
        name - Name of the entity
        dmg - Damage stat value for Enemy
        hp - Health stat value for Enemy
        def - Defense stat value for Enemy
